her.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: belonging to or connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned
her.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Her room was pleasant and airy.
her.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: connected with a country, ship, car etc that has already been mentioned
her.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Her top speed is about 110 miles an hour.
her.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
her.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: Jane? I don’t really know her.
Margaret wants me to go with her.
I think it was her, but I’m not sure.
her.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: used to refer to a country, ship, car etc that has already been mentioned
her.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: God bless this ship and all who sail in her.
